function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of consideration for preparedness actions in resilience models","Impact":"Inadequate preparedness may lead to higher vulnerability to contagious diseases in built environments","Mitigation":"Incorporate preparedness actions into resilience models to enhance overall resilience","Technologies":"Optimization models, network flow analysis, resilience modeling tools","People":"Researchers, policymakers, and infrastructure managers","Owner":"Researchers, policymakers, and infrastructure managers"},{"Description":"Cascading failures in complex networks","Impact":"Cascading failures can lead to network shutdown and disruption of services, potentially contributing to disease propagation","Mitigation":"Develop and implement strategies to enhance network resilience against cascading failures","Technologies":"Network modeling, topology analysis, infrastructure design","People":"Infrastructure managers, network engineers, and policymakers","Owner":"Infrastructure managers, network engineers, and policymakers"},{"Description":"Neglect of recovery dimension in resilience models","Impact":"Inadequate focus on recovery may result in prolonged network downtime and hindered response to disease outbreaks","Mitigation":"Integrate recovery dimension into resilience models to ensure comprehensive resilience planning","Technologies":"Resilience modeling tools, optimization models, recovery strategies","People":"Researchers, emergency response teams, and infrastructure managers","Owner":"Researchers, emergency response teams, and infrastructure managers"}]}
